nodes.text: HoloNet News Exclusive: Mas Amedda receives Governor Arihnda Pryce for Lothal report
HoloNet News Exclusive: Mas Amedda receives Governor Arihnda Pryce for Lothal report is the eleventh video from the Star Wars Rebels tie-in website, HoloNetNews.com. It was posted on October 1, 2014.

In an exclusive HoloNet News report, the Imperial broadcaster Alton Kastle reported on Governor Arihnda Pryce's recent visit to the galactic capital of Coruscant to report on Lothal's "successful" industrial and mining sectors. Since Emperor Palpatine could not attend the special session in person, he was instead represented by Grand Vizier Mas Amedda. Following her report on Lothal's economic development, Governor Pryce was given a special invitation to meet with officials on the planet Eriadu in the following weeks.
